modShortDescription: It adds two explosive blocks. Placeable version of the dynamite and TNT as well as means of connecting explosives together and to electricity.
modDescription:
It adds two explosive blocks. Placeable version of the dynamite and TNT as well as means of connecting explosives together and to [electricity](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-electricity/).

Personally DUDSS has been missing [explosives](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-ammo/) like these. The only way to demolish stuff was using the throwable dynamite which actually despawns in a bit. Very annoying. He just started playing 7 Days to die since Alpha 19 so he doesn’t know where the old [TNT](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) block went. Anyway, this adds it back in a way, with a few more bells and whistles. Would be a shame to not blow stuff up efficiently in a voxel game with structure stability. Would be funny if they added it back in Alpha 20.

## Changelog

**Update 1.1.0**

* Added C4 block
* Added IED block
* Increased TNT hp from 5 to 20
* Increased explosives stack sizes from 20 to 50
* Fixed mod items not showing up in loot
* Fixed incomplete item descriptions

**C4** – A special explosive that doesn’t damage dirt.  
**IED** – An improvised explosive that only damages zombies and players.

**[Download](https://github.com/xDUDSSx/TNT-Mod-for-7dtd/archive/refs/heads/master.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25109-tnt-mod-placeable-explosives/).

**Credits:** DUDSS
